ccre.saver

Class HashMappedStorageSegment

  • java.lang.Object
    • ccre.saver.StorageSegment
      • ccre.saver.HashMappedStorageSegment

  • public abstract class HashMappedStorageSegment
extends StorageSegment
    A base of most StorageSegment implementations. Uses a CHashMap to keep track of data until the data is written out to the disk or other medium.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected CHashMap<java.lang.String,byte[]> data
      The current data stored in this segment.

    • Method Detail

      • getBytesForKey

        public byte[] getBytesForKey(java.lang.String key)
                      throws java.util.NoSuchElementException
        Description copied from class: StorageSegment
        Get raw bytes for the specified key. The return array is expected to not be modified! Create a copy if you need to change the data.
        Specified by:
        getBytesForKey in class StorageSegment
        Parameters:
        key - the key to look up.
        Returns:
        the byte data contained there, or null if the key doesn't exist.
        Throws:
        java.util.NoSuchElementException

      • setBytesForKey

        public void setBytesForKey(java.lang.String key,
                  byte[] bytes)
        Description copied from class: StorageSegment
        Set the byte data behind the specified key. Note: this method assumes that the byte array given will not be modified! Do not modify it after passing it!
        Specified by:
        setBytesForKey in class StorageSegment
        Parameters:
        key - the key to put the bytes under.
        bytes - the bytes to store under this key.
